Uses of Interface
org.osgi.service.resourcemonitoring.ResourceContext

  • Packages that use ResourceContext 
    Package Description
    org.osgi.service.resourcemonitoring
    Resource Monitoring Package Version 1.0.

    • Uses of ResourceContext in org.osgi.service.resourcemonitoring

      Methods in org.osgi.service.resourcemonitoring that return ResourceContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ResourceContext ResourceMonitoringService.createContext(String name, ResourceContext template)
      Creates a new ResourceContext.
      ResourceContext ResourceMonitor.getContext()
      Returns the resource context that this monitor belongs to
      ResourceContext ResourceContextEvent.getContext()
      Retrieves the Resource Context associated to this event
      ResourceContext ResourceEvent.getContext()
      Returns the resource context that caused the event.
      ResourceContext ResourceMonitoringService.getContext(long bundleId)
      Returns the ResourceContext associated to the provided bundle id.
      ResourceContext ResourceMonitoringService.getContext(String name)
      Returns the context with the specified resource context name.
      ResourceContext[] ResourceMonitoringService.listContext()
      Lists all available resource contexts.
      Methods in org.osgi.service.resourcemonitoring with parameters of type ResourceContext 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ResourceContext ResourceMonitoringService.createContext(String name, ResourceContext template)
      Creates a new ResourceContext.
      ResourceMonitor ResourceMonitorFactory.createResourceMonitor(ResourceContext resourceContext)
      Creates a new ResourceMonitor instance.
      void ResourceContext.removeBundle(long bundleId, ResourceContext destination)
      Removes the bundle from this resource context.
      void ResourceContext.removeContext(ResourceContext destination)
      Removes a resource context.
      Constructors in org.osgi.service.resourcemonitoring with parameters of type ResourceContext 
      Constructor and Description
      ResourceContextEvent(int pType, ResourceContext pResourceContext)
      Create a new ResourceContextEvent.
      ResourceContextEvent(int pType, ResourceContext pResourceContext, long pBundleId)
      Create a new ResourceContextEvent.
      ResourceEvent(int pType, ResourceContext pContext, boolean pIsUpperThreshold, Comparable pValue)
      Creates a new ResourceEvent.
